cooked:
Hello internet - I am a computer engineer that is creating my own embedded single board computer. The aims are purely educational at this point, and will focus on an ARM-based SoC.

This is going to happen with or without a specific application, but it would be great to find some open source project or similar that could use some niche hardware.

So with that said - if any projects are in need of a fancy little computer, please let me know!
raw:
Hello internet - I am a computer engineer that is creating my own embedded single board computer.    The aims are purely educational at this point, and will focus on an ARM-based SoC.

This is going to happen with or without a specific application, but it would be great to find some open source project or similar that could use some niche hardware.  

So with that said - if any projects are in need of a fancy little computer, please let me know!
